author: rjmholt

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Have we an issue to exclude powershell.config.json and compile defaults? It was a suggestion from @daxian-dbw

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: That proposal is only for stable release, not preview releases. Experimental features in preview release are all turned on and they should be turned on the same way as in stable release.

title: Get-ExperimentalFeatures tests fail on Raspberry Pi because powershell.config.json does not exist
